org.cloudfoundry.uaa.authorizations

Interface Authorizations


  • public interface Authorizations
    Main entry point to the UAA Authorization Client API

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Mono<String> authorizationCodeGrantApi(AuthorizeByAuthorizationCodeGrantApiRequest request)
      Makes the Authorize By Authorization Code Grant (API) request
      Mono<String> authorizationCodeGrantBrowser(AuthorizeByAuthorizationCodeGrantBrowserRequest request)
      Makes the Authorize By Authorization Code Grant (Browser) request
      Mono<String> implicitGrantBrowser(AuthorizeByImplicitGrantBrowserRequest request)
      Makes the Authorize By Implicit Grant (Browser) request
      Mono<String> openIdWithAuthorizationCodeGrant(AuthorizeByOpenIdWithAuthorizationCodeGrantRequest request)
      Makes the Authorize By Open ID with Authorization Code Grant request
      Mono<String> openIdWithIdToken(AuthorizeByOpenIdWithIdTokenRequest request)
      Makes the Authorize By Open ID with an ID Token request
      Mono<String> openIdWithImplicitGrant(AuthorizeByOpenIdWithImplicitGrantRequest request)
      Makes the Authorize By Open ID with Implicit Grant request
